Question: Four identical cubes are labeled with the letters A, B, C, and D on their visible faces as shown in the diagrams below.
Each diagram shows three visible faces of a cube.

Cube 1: Front face shows A, Top face shows B, Right face shows C
Cube 2: Front face shows B, Top face shows C, Right face shows A
Cube 3: Front face shows C, Top face shows A, Right face shows B
Cube 4: Front face shows D, Top face shows B, Right face shows A

Which of these cubes could be the same cube viewed from different angles? (Note: Each cube has exactly six letters, one on each face.)
